typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Año} as string,
		{Fecha registro} as date,
		{Desc. Sigla Área} as string,
		{ID Tablero} as string,
		{Versión} as string,
		{Eje / Palanca / Temática} as string,
		{ID Palanca} as string,
		Objetivo as string,
		{ID Objetivo} as string,
		{Hito / Indicador} as string,
		{Nombre Indicador} as string,
		{Detalle Indicador} as string,
		{ID Indicador} as string,
		{Tipo Tablero} as string,
		TBG as string,
		{Secuencia / Orden} as string,
		{Valor Peso Indicador} as string,
		{Corto Plazo / Largo Plazo} as string,
		{Valor Límite Inferior} as string,
		{Valor Límite Superior} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SouAtomoConfiguracionTablero
source(output(
		gkIndicador as integer,
		idIndicador as integer,
		descNombreIndicador as string,
		dtmVigenciaDesde as timestamp,
		dtmVigenciaHasta as timestamp,
		descIndicadorHito as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT\n	DI.gkIndicador,\n        DI.idIndicador,\n	DI.descNombreIndicador,\n	DI.dtmVigenciaDesde,\n	DI.dtmVigenciaHasta,\n        DI.descIndicadorHito\nFROM [TD].[DimIndicador] DI\nWHERE DI.idIndicador <> \'-999\' ',
	format: 'query') ~> SouAtomoDimIndicador
source(output(
		gkParamIndicador as integer,
		fkIndicador as integer,
		dtmFechaRegistro as timestamp,
		descDetalleIndicador as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT\ndp.gkParamIndicador,\ndp.fkIndicador,\ndp.dtmFechaRegistro,\ndp.descDetalleIndicador\nFROM [TD].[DimParamIndicador] dp\nWHERE dp.fkIndicador <> 1 AND isnull(descControlCarga,\'\') <> \'INACTIVO\'',
	format: 'query') ~> SouAtomoDimParamIndicador
source(output(
		gkConfiguracionTablero as integer,
		descAnnio as string,
		dtmFechaRegistro as timestamp,
		descSiglaArea as string,
		fkTablero as integer,
		descVersion as string,
		fkEjePalanca as integer,
		fkObjetivo as integer,
		descHitoIndicador as string,
		fkParamIndicador as integer,
		fkIndicador as integer,
		descTipoTablero as string,
		descTBG as string,
		descSecuenciaOrden as string,
		vlrPesoIndicador as decimal(30,10),
		descCortoLargoPlazo as string,
		vlrLimiteInferior as decimal(30,10),
		vlrLimiteSuperior as decimal(30,10),
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descUsuarioCreacion as string,
		dtmFechaModificacion as timestamp,
		descUsuarioModificacion as string,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposinconsistencia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SouAtomoDimConfiguracionTablero
source(output(
		src_descAnnio as string,
		src_dtmFechaRegistro as date,
		src_descSiglaArea as string,
		src_fkTablero as string,
		src_descVersion as string,
		src_fkEjePalanca as string,
		src_fkObjetivo as string,
		src_descHitoIndicador as string,
		src_fkParamIndicador as string,
		src_fkIndicador as string,
		src_descTipoTablero as string,
		src_descTBG as string,
		src_descSecuenciaOrden as string,
		src_vlrPesoIndicador as string,
		src_descCortoLargoPlazo as string,
		src_vlrLimiteInferior as string,
		src_vlrLimiteSuperior as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_descAnnio,\n	CAST(NULL AS DATE) src_dtmFechaRegistro,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_descSiglaArea,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_fkTablero,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_descVersion,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_fkEjePalanca,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_fkObjetivo,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_descHitoIndicador,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_fkParamIndicador,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_fkIndicador,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_descTipoTablero,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_descTBG,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_descSecuenciaOrden,\n	CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_vlrPesoIndicador,\n	CAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS NVARCHAR(1000)) src_descCortoLargoPlazo,\n	CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_vlrLimiteInferior,\n	CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(1000)) src_vlrLimiteSuperior',
	format: 'query') ~> SouAtomoDimConfiguracionTableroComodin
source(output(
		gkEjePalanca as long,
		idEjePalanca as string,
		descEjePalanca as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select gkEjePalanca,idEjePalanca,descEjePalanca from TD.DimEjePalanca',
	format: 'query') ~> SouAtomoDimEjePalanca
source(output(
		gkObjetivo as long,
		idObjetivo as string,
		descObjetivo as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaObjetivo as timestamp,
		dtmFechacarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SouAtomoDimObjetivo
source(output(
		gkTablero as integer,
		idTablero as string,
		descSiglaArea as string,
		descTablero as string,
		descContactoRedDesempeno as string,
		descCargoContactoRedDesempeno as string,
		dtmFechaVigenciaDesde as timestamp,
		dtmFechaVigenciaHasta as timestamp,
		dtmFechaInicioReg as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinReg as timestamp,
		descEstadoReg as string,
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SouAtomoDimTablero
SouAtomoConfiguracionTablero select(mapColumn(
		src_descAnnio = {Año},
		src_dtmFechaRegistro = {Fecha registro},
		{ src_descSiglaArea} = {Desc. Sigla Área},
		src_fkTablero = {ID Tablero},
		src_descVersion = {Versión},
		src_fkEjePalanca = {ID Palanca},
		src_fkObjetivo = {ID Objetivo},
		src_descHitoIndicador = {Hito / Indicador},
		src_fkIndicador = {Nombre Indicador},
		src_fkParamIndicador = {Detalle Indicador},
		src_descTipoTablero = {Tipo Tablero},
		src_descTBG = TBG,
		src_descSecuenciaOrden = {Secuencia / Orden},
		src_vlrPesoIndicador = {Valor Peso Indicador},
		src_descCortoLargoPlazo = {Corto Plazo / Largo Plazo},
		src_vlrLimiteInferior = {Valor Límite Inferior},
		src_vlrLimiteSuperior = {Valor Límite Superior}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SltConvertirAtributos
SouAtomoDimConfiguracionTableroComodin, SltConvertirAtributos union(byName: true)~> UniSltConSouAtomoDimConfiguracionTableroComodin
UniSltConSouAtomoDimConfiguracionTableroComodin derive(src_descAnnio = trim(src_descAnnio),
		src_descSiglaArea = trim(src_descSiglaArea),
		src_fkTablero = toInteger(trim(src_fkTablero)),
		src_descVersion = trim(src_descVersion),
		src_fkEjePalanca = toInteger(trim(src_fkEjePalanca)),
		src_fkObjetivo = toInteger(trim(src_fkObjetivo)),
		src_descHitoIndicador = upper(trim(src_descHitoIndicador)),
		src_fkParamIndicador = trim(upper(src_fkParamIndicador)),
		src_fkIndicador = trim(upper(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(src_fkIndicador, 'á', 'a'), 'é','e'), 'í', 'i'), 'ó', 'o'), 'ú','u'))),
		src_descTipoTablero = trim(src_descTipoTablero),
		src_descTBG = trim(src_descTBG),
		src_descSecuenciaOrden = trim(src_descSecuenciaOrden),
		src_vlrPesoIndicador = toDecimal(src_vlrPesoIndicador, 30, 10),
		src_descCortoLargoPlazo = trim(src_descCortoLargoPlazo),
		src_vlrLimiteInferior = toDecimal(src_vlrLimiteInferior, 30, 10),
		src_vlrLimiteSuperior = toDecimal(src_vlrLimiteSuperior, 30, 10),
		src_descUsuarioCreacion = 'adminatomo@ecopetrol.com.co',
		src_dtmFechaModificacion = 'NULL',
		src_descUsuarioModificacion = 'NULL',
		src_descOrigen = 'EXCEL:DMTD_Plantilla_ConfiguracionTableros.xlsx',
		src_fkTiposinconsistencia = 0) ~> DrcLimpiezaDatos
SouAtomoDimIndicador derive(descNombreIndicador = trim(upper(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(descNombreIndicador, 'á', 'a'), 'é','e'), 'í', 'i'), 'ó', 'o'), 'ú','u'))),
		dtmVigenciaDesde = toDate(dtmVigenciaDesde),
		dtmVigenciaHasta = toDate(dtmVigenciaHasta),
		descIndicadorHito = trim(upper(descIndicadorHito))) ~> DrcLimpiezaDatosSouAtomoDimIndicador
DrcLimpiezaDatosSouAtomoDimIndicador derive(descNombreIndicador = replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(descNombreIndicador, 'Á', 'A'), 'É','E'), 'Í', 'I'), 'Ó', 'O'), 'Ú','U')) ~> DrcQuitarTildesSouAtomoDimIndicador
DrcLimpiezaDatos derive(src_fkIndicador = replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(src_fkIndicador, 'Á', 'A'), 'É','E'), 'Í', 'I'), 'Ó', 'O'), 'Ú','U')) ~> DrcQuitarTildesMayusculas
DrcgkEjepalanca, DrcQuitarTildesSouAtomoDimIndicador join(src_fkIndicador == descNombreIndicador
	&& src_dtmFechaRegistro >= dtmVigenciaDesde
	&& src_dtmFechaRegistro <= dtmVigenciaHasta
	&& src_descHitoIndicador == descIndicadorHito,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoiConfiguracionTableroDimIndicador
JoiConfiguracionTableroDimIndicador, DrcLimpiezaDatosSouAtomoDimParamIndicador join(src_dtmFechaRegistro == dtmFechaRegistro
	&& gkIndicador == fkIndicador
	&& src_fkParamIndicador == descDetalleIndicador,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoiConfiguracionTableroDimParamIndicador
SouAtomoDimParamIndicador derive(dtmFechaRegistro = toDate(dtmFechaRegistro),
		descDetalleIndicador = upper(descDetalleIndicador)) ~> DrcLimpiezaDatosSouAtomoDimParamIndicador
JoiConfiguracionTableroDimParamIndicador select(mapColumn(
		src_descAnnio,
		src_dtmFechaRegistro,
		{ src_descSiglaArea},
		src_fkTablero,
		src_descVersion,
		src_fkEjePalanca,
		src_fkObjetivo,
		src_descHitoIndicador,
		src_fkParamIndicador = gkParamIndicador,
		src_fkIndicador = gkIndicador,
		src_descTipoTablero,
		src_descTBG,
		src_descSecuenciaOrden,
		src_vlrPesoIndicador,
		src_descCortoLargoPlazo,
		src_vlrLimiteInferior,
		src_vlrLimiteSuperior,
		src_descUsuarioCreacion,
		src_dtmFechaModificacion,
		src_descUsuarioModificacion,
		src_descOrigen,
		src_fkTiposinconsistencia,
		gkEjePalanca,
		gkTablero,
		gkObjetivo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SltFiltrarAtributos
SltFiltrarAtributos, DrcConvertToDate join(gkTablero == fkTablero
	&& src_fkParamIndicador == fkParamIndicador
	&& src_descAnnio == descAnnio,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimConfiguracionTablero
JoinDimConfiguracionTablero split((gkTablero == fkTablero) && (src_fkParamIndicador == fkParamIndicador) && (src_descAnnio == descAnnio),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Match, NoMatch)
SouAtomoDimConfiguracionTablero derive(dtmFechaRegistro = toDate(dtmFechaRegistro)) ~> DrcConvertToDate
ConditionalSplit1@Match alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AltFilasTypo1
DrcQuitarTildesMayusculas, SouAtomoDimEjePalanca join(toString(src_fkEjePalanca) == idEjePalanca,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimEjePalanca
JoinDimTablero derive(gkEjePalanca = iifNull(gkEjePalanca,1),
		gkObjetivo = iifNull(gkObjetivo,1),
		gkTablero = iifNull(gkTablero,1)) ~> DrcgkEjepalanca
JoinDimEjePalanca, SouAtomoDimObjetivo join(toString(src_fkObjetivo) == idObjetivo,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimObjetivo
JoinDimObjetivo, SouAtomoDimTablero join(toString(src_fkTablero) == idTablero,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimTablero
ConditionalSplit1@NoMatch sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkConfiguracionTablero as integer,
		descAnnio as string,
		dtmFechaRegistro as timestamp,
		descSiglaArea as string,
		fkTablero as integer,
		descVersion as string,
		fkEjePalanca as integer,
		fkObjetivo as integer,
		descHitoIndicador as string,
		fkParamIndicador as integer,
		fkIndicador as integer,
		descTipoTablero as string,
		descTBG as string,
		descSecuenciaOrden as string,
		vlrPesoIndicador as decimal(30,10),
		descCortoLargoPlazo as string,
		vlrLimiteInferior as decimal(30,10),
		vlrLimiteSuperior as decimal(30,10),
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descUsuarioCreacion as string,
		dtmFechaModificacion as timestamp,
		descUsuarioModificacion as string,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposinconsistencia as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:[' '],
	postSQLs:[' '],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		descAnnio = src_descAnnio,
		dtmFechaRegistro = src_dtmFechaRegistro,
		descSiglaArea = { src_descSiglaArea},
		fkTablero = gkTablero,
		descVersion = src_descVersion,
		fkEjePalanca = gkEjePalanca,
		fkObjetivo = gkObjetivo,
		descHitoIndicador = src_descHitoIndicador,
		fkParamIndicador = src_fkParamIndicador,
		fkIndicador = src_fkIndicador,
		descTipoTablero = src_descTipoTablero,
		descTBG = src_descTBG,
		descSecuenciaOrden = src_descSecuenciaOrden,
		vlrPesoIndicador = src_vlrPesoIndicador,
		descCortoLargoPlazo = src_descCortoLargoPlazo,
		vlrLimiteInferior = src_vlrLimiteInferior,
		vlrLimiteSuperior = src_vlrLimiteSuperior,
		descUsuarioCreacion = src_descUsuarioCreacion,
		descOrigen = src_descOrigen,
		fkTiposinconsistencia = src_fkTiposinconsistencia
	)) ~> SinkAtomoDimConfiguracionTableroType0
AltFilasTypo1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkConfiguracionTablero as integer,
		descAnnio as string,
		dtmFechaRegistro as timestamp,
		descSiglaArea as string,
		fkTablero as integer,
		descVersion as string,
		fkEjePalanca as integer,
		fkObjetivo as integer,
		descHitoIndicador as string,
		fkParamIndicador as integer,
		fkIndicador as integer,
		descTipoTablero as string,
		descTBG as string,
		descSecuenciaOrden as string,
		vlrPesoIndicador as decimal(30,10),
		descCortoLargoPlazo as string,
		vlrLimiteInferior as decimal(30,10),
		vlrLimiteSuperior as decimal(30,10),
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descUsuarioCreacion as string,
		dtmFechaModificacion as timestamp,
		descUsuarioModificacion as string,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposinconsistencia as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['fkTablero','fkParamIndicador','descAnnio'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		fkTablero = gkTablero,
		fkParamIndicador = src_fkParamIndicador,
		descAnnio = src_descAnnio,
		descHitoIndicador = src_descHitoIndicador,
		descVersion = src_descVersion,
		descTipoTablero = src_descTipoTablero,
		descTBG = src_descTBG,
		descSecuenciaOrden = src_descSecuenciaOrden,
		vlrPesoIndicador = src_vlrPesoIndicador,
		descCortoLargoPlazo = src_descCortoLargoPlazo,
		vlrLimiteInferior = src_vlrLimiteInferior,
		vlrLimiteSuperior = src_vlrLimiteSuperior,
		fkEjePalanca = gkEjePalanca,
		fkObjetivo = gkObjetivo,
		descSiglaArea = { src_descSiglaArea}
	)) ~> SinkAtomoDimConfiguracionTableroType1
